articles.title: Taylor Hawkins death: Foo Fighters frontman Dave Grohl in emotional arrival in LA with bandmates - PerthNow
articles.description: Dave Grohl has made an emotional arrival back on American soil with his Foo Fighters bandmates after the shock death of drummer Taylor Hawkins, who it has been revealed had a heart double the normal size.
